info.title: ShippingStatus API
info.description: Receive status information about your shipments

get.summary: Returns the statuses for a particular barcode
get.description:
Request example:
```
curl -X GET "https://api-sandbox.postnl.nl/shipment/v2/status/barcode/3SDEVC172649258" \
 -H "Accept: application/json" \
 -H "apikey: APIKEY-HERE" \
```

parameters.name: barcode
parameters.description: Barcode of the shipment. This is a unique value.

parameters.name: detail
parameters.description: Option to include old statuses in the response

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language of the returned shipment and status descriptions (default is Dutch).

parameters.name: maxDays
parameters.description: Limit the number of days that will be searched (decrease this amount for better performance).

get.summary: Get status information by customer reference
get.description:
Request example:
```
curl -X GET "https://api-sandbox.postnl.nl/shipment/v2/status/reference?detail=true&language=NL&customerCode={{CustomerCode}}&customerNumber={{CustomerNumber}}&reference=REF98173245876329" \
 -H "Accept: application/json" \
 -H "apikey: APIKEY-HERE" 
```

parameters.name: customerCode
parameters.description: Customer code as known at PostNL Pakketten

parameters.name: customerNumber
parameters.description: Customer number as known at PostNL Pakketten

parameters.name: referenceId
parameters.description: The customer reference belonging to the shipment

parameters.name: detail
parameters.description: Option to include old statuses in the response

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language of the returned shipment and status descriptions (default is Dutch).

parameters.name: maxDays
parameters.description: Limit the number of days that will be searched (decrease this amount for better performance). By default this is 90 days in the past.

get.summary: Returns the signature of a particular shipment
get.description:
Request example:
```
curl -X GET "https://api-sandbox.postnl.nl/shipment/v2/status/signature/3SDEVC172649258" \
 -H "Accept: application/json" \
 -H "apikey: APIKEY-HERE" 
```

get.summary: Returns the updated statuses for a particular customer number
get.description:
Request example:
```
curl -X GET "https://api-sandbox.postnl.nl/shipment/v2/status/11223344/updatedshipments?period=2022-12-25T10:00:00&period=2022-12-25T10:12:00" \
 -H "Accept: application/json" \
 -H "apikey: APIKEY-HERE" \
```

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Optional array which defines a specific period in which to return updated shipments. For optimal results, schedule calls at a frequency between 5-15 minutes and align the requested period accordingly to ensure complete coverage of past updates. Shorter periods yield improved response times. The API accommodates a maximum requested period of 2 hours, granting access to shipment data up to 48 hours in the past. Please use the following format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS and repeat this variable to define the period (e.g. /updatedshipments?period=2022-11-07T12:00:00.000&period=2022-11-07T12:05:00.000).

CompleteStatus.description: The current status and old statuses of the shipment

MainBarcode.description: The main barcode of the shipment

ShipmentAmount.description: The amount of parcels in the multi-collo shipment

ShipmentCounter.description: The sequence of this parcel in the multi-collo shipment

CustomerCode.description: The customer code of the shipment

CustomerNumber.description: The customer number of the shipment

ProductCode.description: The product code of the shipment

ProductDescription.description: The description of the product code

Reference.description: The customer reference belonging to the shipment

DeliveryDate.description: The expected delivery date of the shipment

Amount.description: The amounts belonging to the shipment

VerzekerdBedrag.description: The insurance amount of the shipment

Address.description: A list of addresses belonging to the shipment

Event.description: The events of the shipment. (see the [Event Codes](#tag/TandT-status-codes/Event-codes) for possible values.

Description.example: Pakket is nog niet door PostNL ontvangen of verwerkt

Status.description: The current status of the shipment (see the [Status codes](#tag/TandT-status-codes/Status-codes) for possible values.

OldStatus.description: A list of previous status codes (see the [Status codes](#tag/TandT-status-codes/Status-codes) for possible values.

CurrentStatus.description: The current status and old statuses of the shipment

ShipmentAmount.description: The amount of parcels in the multi-collo shipment

ShipmentCounter.description: The sequence of this parcel in the multi-collo shipment

CustomerNumber.description: The customer number of the shipment

ProductCode.description: The product code of the shipment

ProductDescription.description: The description of the product code

Reference.description: The customer reference belonging to the shipment

DeliveryDate.description: The expected delivery date of the shipment

Address.description: A list of addresses belonging to the shipment

OptionCode.description: The product option code for this ProductOption.

Status.description: The current status of the shipment (see the [Status codes](#tag/TandT-status-codes/Status-codes) for possible values.

Warnings.description: Possible warnings (see [Error Codes](#tag/Error-codes) for possible values)

Barcode.description: The barcode of the shipment for which the signature is returned

SignatureImage.description: The signature content; base64 encoded GIF format.

Barcode.description: The barcode belonging to the status update

Status.description: The status update. See [Status codes](#tag/TandT-status-codes/Status-codes) for possible values.
